00035    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00036    class FSArray 
00037    {
00038 
00039    public:
00040 
00044       FSArray();

00146    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00147    inline FSArray<Data, Capacity>::FSArray()
00148     : size_(0)
00149    {}
00150 
00156    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00157    FSArray<Data, Capacity>::FSArray(const FSArray<Data, Capacity>& other) 
00158    {
00159       size_  = other.size_;
00160       for (int i = 0; i < size_; ++i) {
00161          data_[i] = other.data_[i];
00162       }
00163    }
00164 
00172    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00173    FSArray<Data, Capacity>& 
00174    FSArray<Data, Capacity>::operator=(const FSArray<Data, Capacity>& other) 
00175    {
00176 
00177       // Check for self assignment
00178       if (this == &other) return *this;
00179 
00180       // Copy elements
00181       for (int i = 0; i < size_; ++i) {
00182          data_[i] = other[i];
00183       }
00184       size = other.size_;
00185 
00186       return *this;
00187    }
00188 
00192    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00193    FSArray<Data, Capacity>::~FSArray()
00194    {}
00195 
00196    /*
00197    * Return physical capacity of array.
00198    */
00199    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00200    int FSArray<Data, Capacity>::capacity() const
00201    { return Capacity; }
00202 
00206    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00207    int FSArray<Data, Capacity>::size() const
00208    { return size_; }
00209 
00215    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00216    void FSArray<Data, Capacity>::begin(ArrayIterator<Data> &iterator)
00217    {
00218       iterator.setCurrent(data_);
00219       iterator.setEnd(data_ + size_);
00220    }
00221 
00222    /*
00223    * Set a ConstArrayIterator to the beginning of this Array.
00224    */
00225    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00226    void FSArray<Data, Capacity>::begin(ConstArrayIterator<Data> &iterator) const
00227    {
00228       iterator.setCurrent(data_);
00229       iterator.setEnd(data_ + size_);
00230    }
00231 
00232    /*
00233    * Mimic C array subscripting.
00234    */
00235    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00236    Data& FSArray<Data, Capacity>::operator[] (int i) 
00237    {
00238       assert(i < size_);
00239       assert(i >= 0);
00240       return data_[i];
00241    }
00242 
00243    /*
00244    * Mimic C array subscripting.
00245    */
00246    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00247    const Data& FSArray<Data, Capacity>::operator[] (int i) const
00248    {
00249       assert(i < size_);
00250       assert(i >= 0);
00251       return data_[i];
00252    }
00253 
00254    /*
00255    * Append data to the end of the array.
00256    */
00257    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00258    inline void FSArray<Data, Capacity>::append(const Data &data) 
00259    {
00260       if (size_ == Capacity) {
00261          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to add to full FSArray");
00262       }
00263       data_[size_] = data;
00264       ++size_;
00265    }
00266 
00270    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00271    inline void FSArray<Data, Capacity>::clear() 
00272    { size_ = 0; }
00273 
00274    /*
00275    * Serialize a FSArray to/from an Archive.
00276    */
00277    template <class Data, int Capacity>
00278    template <class Archive>
00279    inline void FSArray<Data, Capacity>::serialize(Archive& ar, 
00280                                           const unsigned int version)
00281    {
00282       ar & size_;
00283       for (int i = 0; i < Capacity; ++i) {
00284          ar & data_[i];
00285       }
00286    }
00287 
00288    /*
00289    * Packed size of FSArray in a MemoryArchive, in bytes.
00290    */
00291    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00292    inline int FSArray<Data, Capacity>::packedSize()
00293    {  return Capacity*sizeof(Data) + sizeof(int); }
